amendment.description: An amendment numbered 83 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to direct an additional $3,000,000 to DOJ's Children of Incarcerated Parents program to support reentry services and family reunification upon release.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Ms. Pressley.
